item.title: √Öpmam na Manugi' Yu' Guini
item.description: Hu prumeti hamyu na ti maleffa yu’ nu ini na “blog” üòÅ. Ginin i ma’pus na Huliu, hu gof na’siguru na si√±a yu’ manugi’ guini sa’ masang√•ni yu’ na ti si√±a pumo’lu iyo-ku na kod gi publikun sagan kod1, yan k√•o un tungu’ m√•nu nai hu po’lu ini na “blog”?… Ha’a, dinanchi!…gi publikun sagan kod! üôÉ Ya pues ti manugi’ “blog” asta ki sen siguru yu’ na si√±a manugi’ yu’ guini!

item.title: Gi Nuebun Cho'chu', Gi Nuebun Hinanao
item.description: H√•fa adai todus hamyu! Hu tungu’ na ti m√•nggi’ gi halacha gi esti na blog üòÖ, laooo gaigi yu’ guini p√•’gu! Meeeegagagai na masusedi gi lina’l√•’-hu gi ma’pus na mes - gi minag√•hit, mampus! ü´† Guaha maolek yan b√•ba lokkui’ na sinisedi-hu. Fine’nena: i b√•ba siha: Makonni’ i neni-hu para √©spit√•t (ya masang√•ni yu’ na buenti gai asthma gui’ üò©) Annai gaigi yu’ giya Gu√•han, gumai COVID yu’ (yan todu taotao gi iriy√•-hu lokkui’!

item.title: Trongkun Manggaf√•-hu Pt. 2
item.description: I Trongkun Manggaf√•-hu P√•'gu I Bandan Nan√•-hu I Bandan Tat√•-hu Pues H√•fa P√•'gu? First things first: if you haven’t seen my first post re: my family tree then you can read it here. Okay, nihi ta tutuhun: I’ve been busy, dispensa yu’! I’ve been neck-deep in work and life in general, but I’m here now and I’m excited to share an update on my family tree! üôåüèΩ I wasn’t sure how much further I’d get honestly - I was doing so much research prior to December that I felt I’d found all the info that I could.

item.title: Mama'titinas Diksion√•rion Chamoru
item.description: H√•fa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung ni’ tumataitai esti! It’s been over a month-and-a-half since I’ve blogged and not a week has gone by where I thought to myself, “ai adai, debi di bai fa’tinas otru na blog”, but honestly my schedule has just been todu machalapon. I had to take a step back from dang near everything and reasses my priorities and how I spend my time outside of work - hence my absence üòÖ.

item.title: Mama'titinas Trongkun Mangg√•fa
item.description: I’ve been on a journey to document my family tree in a tech-saavy way. It started off simple: try and find out who my great-grandparents were. I honestly didn’t think I’d get past that because before this I couldn’t even tell you the names of any of my great-grandparents. But as you’ll soon find out, my simple task turned into a research-heavy adventure which is still ongoing. This wasn’t on my to-do list until recently - I’d say within the last 2 years.

item.title: Ha'√•nen "Liberasi√≥n"
item.description: TW/CW: Mentions of war. I can’t recall a time when my family celebrated “Liberation Day”. I can recall times that we volunteered at the Sons & Daughters of Guam Club for Liberation fiestas: cleaning, cooking, setting up & breaking down, etc…but being young, I wasn’t interested in the “whys” of fiestas. But celebrating at home? T√•ya’. I’m positive there’s complexities behind that. I mean, growing up I only ever heard one story about the war from my dad’s mom.

item.title: Hu Fa'mamaolek Esti na Blog
item.description: H√•fa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung! Hu tungu’ na tumaigui yu’ giya guini, lao hu prometi hamyu na ti √•pmam bai tutuhun m√•nggi’ guini. Buenti gumuaha tiempo-ku gi mamaila’ na sem√•na, lao siempri gi mamaila’ na mes - puedi ti m√•s an√•kku’ sa’ malago’ yu’ fa’maolek esti na blog. Bai hu tulaika i “theme” ya hu tungu’ na gumuaha meggai tinilaika siha ni’ hu chek pat chagi. Todu ha’ para p√•’gu.

item.title: Kumeke'etsisiu Yu' Kada Ha'√•ni
item.description: Cha’-hu dagi hamyu. Kumahulo’ yu’ gi taftaf ogga’an kada ha’√•ni ya ti malago’ ha’ yu’ umetsisiu. Hu tungu’ na etsisiu u na’labr√•bu yu’, lao mapput para hu sodda’ i metgot-hu. LAO mag√•het na kumeke’etsisiu yu’ kada ogga’an, pat atu’√•si kada ha’√•ni…pat kada sem√•na, haha. Esta hu chachagi kum√•nnu’ labr√•bun n√©ngkanu: meggai gollai, meggai golosina, ya ti hu chagi kum√•nnu’ mampus k√•tni (lao hu chagi kum√•nnu’ n√©ngkanu ginen i tasi kada si√±a yu’.

item.title: Biba Mes Chamoru!
item.description: H√•fa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung! P√•’gu na ha’√•ni i tinituhun-√±a nu Mes Chamoru! Hu tungu’ na ti sessu m√•ngge’ yu’ guini, lao hu prometi hamyu na hu chachagi! Kada diha gof tinani’ ha’ yu’: guaha mampus che’cho’-hu, guaha mampus tarehan guma’ put eskuela, ya manh√•halom ha’ ham yan i manggaf√•-hu gi un nuebun guma'. Ai adai, fann√•’i yu’ i anim√•s-miyu fan. Siempri bai kef√•ngge’ guini, kolo’lo’√±a sa’ p√•’gu i Mes Chamoru.

item.title: Guaha Mampus Para Cho'gui
item.description: Ai adai, dispensa na gof atrasao ini na blog! Gi minag√•het, sen tinani’ yu’ lao guaha maolek na rason na taiguini. Na’kadada’ un an√•kku’ na istoria: ti apmam bai in fa√±√•ga gi nuebun guma’, yan i ma√±ain√•-hu yan che’lu-hu. Ohala’ mohon na ti apmam si√±a m√•nggi’ yu’ kosa ki si√±a hu sang√•ni hamyu h√•fa nuebu gi lina’l√•’-hu. Esta otro tiempu nai! Todu ha’ para p√•’gu. Bula guinaiya! — DJT. English Translation My goodness, apologies for this late blog!

item.title: I Lahi-hu Kumpreprendi i Ilelek-hu
item.description: Kada diha hu usa fino’ Chamoru gi i gima’-hu yan i famili√•-ku, i asagu√•-hu yan i lahi-hu, si Lorie yan si Leo. Gi minag√•het, ti sessu hu usa nuebu na pal√•bra siha yan siha, lao siempri hu adingani siha gi fino’ Chamoru. Guaha na bi√•hi na hu ke’usa nuebu na pal√•bra siha, pi√≥t yan i lahi-hu, ya kada diha si√±a manli’i’ yu’ na ha na’la’tungu’ gui’. Hu tungu’ na ha kumprendi annai hu sang√•ni gui':

item.title: Minalago' Siha Para I Tinilaikan I Sakkan
item.description: H√•fa adai todus hamyu! Guaha un nuebun s√•kkan ya malago’ yu’ pum√•tti hamyu ni hinasso-ku siha para iyo-ku blog para i mamaila’ s√•kkan. Guaha ideha-hu siha na hinasso-ku siempri na’d√•ngkulu i tiningu’-hu gi Fino’ Chamoru, ya eyu nai bai m√•nggi’ put: Manggaf√•-hu Nengk√•nu’ ni’ chumocho yan mama’tinas yu' Lepblo-ku siha ni’ manaitai yu' Todu kosas gi Tek Esta m√•nggi’ yu’ ni manggaf√•-hu lao ya-hu bai m√•nggi’ nu nengk√•nu’, lepblo siha, yan tek, kulolo’√±a put sigurid√°t gi tek.

item.title: Magof P√•sgua Nochebuena 2020
item.description: H√•fa adai todus hamyu yan Magof P√•sgua Nochebuena para siha ni’ ma√±ilebra. Christmas time for me today has shifted mostly towards i bandan asagu√•-hu. Gi minag√•het, hagas ha’ hu silebra Nochebuena yan i famili√•-√±a. On my side of the family we tend to split time between my dad’s side and my mom’s side. Even then, those parties tend to be closer to New Years or after, i.e., my family tends to celebrate Christmas after New Years — ya maolek-√±a i “sales” dispues di New Years ki antes, hunggan?

item.title: Kasiyas 2020
item.description: Hu tugi’ ini na poem para Kasiyas 2020; put hu sohyu’ todus hamyu para konsigi fumino’ Chamoru. Yanggen malago’ hao umegga’, si√±a hao gi Facebook –> click here (manaitai yu’ gi ~45 minutes üëçüèº) — translation below poem Fino’ Chamoru Mungnga ma‚Äô√•‚Äô√±ao fumino‚Äô Chamoru, Achokka‚Äô ennao muna‚Äôma‚Äô√•‚Äô√±ao hao. Achokka‚Äô hinasso-mu na mapput para h√•gu, Maolek√±a kumekefino’ ki pum√•para Si√±a un tutuhun p√•‚Äôgu na ha‚Äô√•ni, Lao maolek ha‚Äô yanggen ti si√±a hao.

item.title: Adingani i Lahi-hu Pt. 2
item.description: I finene’na na blog guini. Buenas yan h√•fa adai todus hamyu! √Öpmam na tiempu na m√•nggi’ yu’ guini, hunggan? Gi minag√•het, gof tinani’ yu’ desde ki t√•tti hugua na pulan. Kada diha hu ripiti ta’lu na bid√•-hu: makm√•ta yu’ yan etsisiu pat chochu, pues macho’chu’, ya pues hug√•ndu yan i lahi-hu. Todu eyu ha tifi’ yu’, lol. I asunto put ini na blog kosa ki hu m√•s p√•tti hamyu ni taiminapput sin√•ngan siha na hu sang√•ni i lahi-hu.

item.title: Mampus Chaddek i Lahi-hu
item.description: Kada diha, hu li’i’ mal√•lagu i lahi-hu gi uriyan guma’-m√•mi. Gaigi gui’ gi me’nan potta, pues ha mal√•gu h√•lum i kuatton-m√•mi, pues gaigi gui’ gi tatti yu’ pat fi’on-hu. Ai adai, guaha na bi√•hi ti si√±a hu sodda’ i tiempu para dumesk√•nsa. Lao gi minag√•het, eyu ha na’magof yu’ sa’ hu lili’i’ gui’ dum√•ngkulu; m√•s chumach√•lek gui’, gof ya-√±a humug√•gandu yan hami yan si Lorie asagu√•-hu, ya bula kumukuentus gui'!

item.title: Adingani i Lahi-hu
item.description: Note: updated 2020-12-22 by removing reference to my since-deleted write.as blog. Most of the Chamoru that I’ve been using lately is towards i lahi-hu. H√•cha na s√•kkan id√•t-√±a, pues inadingan-m√•mi ni ti mapput. I wanted to share some of those phrases with you and perhaps get some feedback. If you’re here then I’ll assume you came from Twitter, IG, or some other social media site. Feel free to hit me up on any of those.

item.title: I Tinituhon
item.description: Note: Updated 2020-12-22 with added English title. Buenas yan h√•fa adai todus hamyu! Guahu i che’lun-miyu as David Taitingfong ya ini iyo-ku na blog ni’ un taitaitai. I’ve been meaning to get this space started for some time but, if I’m being honest, so many things have gotten in my way - and by many things I mean myself and the plethora of projects that I can’t seem to stop accruing.
